Articles.Content:
I don't have a 1.0.2 save. How hard is it to get one?

EDIT: And, if I understand correctly, the craft has its BDArmory parts removed from it, as well as radiators?

Edited November 4, 2015 by Alphasus

Might have to leave your craft unfortunately. If you bought the game via KSP's website then you can just download it there but I don't think it's possible through any other way. I only removed the part from the new BD update, the radiators aren't a problem. The 1.0.2 friendly version doesn't work either (I also took the BD part off with that). The problem isn't compatibility, the ship will load, but most parts are missing and it isn't editable. Opening the craft file after loading it in 1.0.2 doesn't look normal. It's a scrambled version of what it should look like.
have any of my craft made it in?

The last thing that I could think of was possibly missile attachment nodes. The racks have too many nodes, and I also reverted the version number on my computer. So far, no issues. I'll send you the file with my last attempt.

http://www./download/c5uvmn5chpwm477/SAP-C_Raven_Tank_HKA.craft
New ships and a regeneration for live MP in progress.
http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...=1#post2253456 just added some new craft i think its something really special
so grey, what about that dreadnought you were oh-so-teasing us about?

so grey, what about that dreadnought you were oh-so-teasing us about?

Something new approaches......

Edited November 7, 2015 by Greymangames

http://i.imgur.com/3RbsQlA.jpg

Something new approaches......

Ooh, this could be interesting.

I don't know if I was to late to submit these but here is my craft/company submission.

Kerbal United Foundation

Bio.

At the K.U.F. we focus on the protection of our allies by ground, or space combat. we currently have a kethane mining rig on Minmus that was just attacked by a GMI bomber that came from the Cerebus Station almost killing the the pilot of the base. We send diplomats to there headquarters with a declaration of war for destruction of company property. They say that they didn't do it which infuriates us even more.

Craft Images

Javascript is disabled. View full album

If you like the craft images Hatbat comment, and I will send an Email with the craft files and description of the crafts in it.

Edited November 8, 2015 by CrenulateFish

Ooh, this could be interesting.

http://i.imgur.com/7rL1IkT.jpg

That's just another Trafalgar Co. Victory

I ain't scared
The Victory was defeated by one of Zekes' own missiles.
HatBat I have 4 new tanks, but they use new BDArmory features. Do you know when the next ground battle will be?
Another next gen craft added.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

The Ezequiel tank chassis is a new chassis design featuring multi layered armor, and an unmanned design. She has 5 different variations:

Ezequiel Main Battle Tank:207 parts

This vehicle has a powerful anti-tank gun, and is the lightest in the Ezequiel series.

[TABLE=class: grid, width: 500]

[TR]

[TD]Equipment:[/TD]

[TD]1x Targeting Pod, 10x Smoke Countermeasures[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Mass:[/TD]

[TD]16.28 tonnes[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Armament:[/TD]

[TD]1x M1 Abrams 120mm Cannon[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

Ezequiel Tank Destroyer:249 parts

This vehicle has a large missile array designed to be able to flip a heavy tank, along with quad defensive turrets and twin vulcan cannons.

[TABLE=class: grid, width: 500]

[TR]

[TD]Equipment:[/TD]

[TD]2x Targeting Pod, 10x Smoke Countermeasures[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Mass:[/TD]

[TD]17.15 tonnes[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Armament:[/TD]

[TD]2x 20mm Vulcan Cannon, 4x .50 cal Twin Turret, 18x Hellfire Missiles[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

Ezequiel CIWS:210 parts

This vehicle has a powerful dual-purpose anti missile and anti-aircraft cannon, along with 4 machine guns for defense against ground vehicles.

[TABLE=class: grid, width: 500]

[TR]

[TD]Equipment:[/TD]

[TD]1x TWS Locking Radar, 1x Targeting Pod, 10x Smoke Countermeasures[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Mass:[/TD]

[TD]21.77 tonnes[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Armament:[/TD]

[TD]1x Goalkeeper CIWS 30mm, 4x .50 cal Twin Turret[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

Ezequiel "MARS" Mobile ARtillery System:238 parts

This vehicle has a very heavy armament, and is designed for long range bombardment of the enemy. She has stabilizer legs as well to keep stability while firing.

[TABLE=class: grid, width: 500]

[TR]

[TD]Equipment:[/TD]

[TD]1x Targeting Pod, 10x Smoke Countermeasures[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Mass:[/TD]

[TD]21.62 tonnes[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Armament:[/TD]

[TD]4x 105mm M102 Howitzer[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

Ezequiel AAA:223 parts

This vehicle has a very powerful anti-aircraft armament, and 2 machine guns to protect itself from ground vehicles.

[TABLE=class: grid, width: 500]

[TR]

[TD]Equipment:[/TD]

[TD]1x TWS Locking Radar, 1x Targeting Pod, 10x Smoke Countermeasures[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Mass:[/TD]

[TD]17.37 tonnes[/TD]

[/TR]

[TR]

[TD]Armament:[/TD]

[TD]6x PAC-3 Intercept Missiles, 2x .50 cal Twin Turret[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

These vessels were all built by SAP-C for HKA and their own usage. However, GMI hacked the servers where the blueprints were found, and now know how to make them(they can be used for both HKA and GMI).

Link here:https://www./folder/xbha2kbnoxnze/Ezequiel_Chassis

Dayum Alpha, I need to step up my atmo game.

okay im gonna take a break for disgning craft for a while so my current craft will do just fine lets just hope fingers crossed that at least one of 15+ crafts can make into a future episode http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91795-Military-Series-Ship-Submissions?p=2253456&viewfull=1#post2253456 (my craft)

just a little proof of concept that the Avacyn CARRIER can actually CARRY things

EDIT: I've PMed you again Hatbat since I have made significant changes to two of my ships

Now with 300% more simplicity!
